content: * stay strong my love her voice touched his conscience like velvet gloved fingers he threw himself against the blazing storm of magic holding on for dear life- * **the twisted heart socks are the second pattern of the chasing magic sock series - a monthly free sock and story series through the whole year of 2026 you can find the full story chapter for the twisted hearts socks on** https //www awildflowerslife blog/category/chasing-magic/ **yarn** the socks in the pictures were made using *lang yarns jawoll superwash 50g = 210m/230yds * you can use any fingering weight sock yarn of your choice **construction** the twisted hearts socks are worked cuff-down featuring a modified celtic hearts cable pattern on the outer edge of the foot the placement is different on both socks the heel is a classic heel flap and gusset construction the toe is a classic wedged toe sewn closed at the end using kitchener stitch **instrutions** the instructions feature charted- as well as written constructions for the cable section **difficulty** advanced/ adventurous beginner the socks can be knitted in any method of your choice dpns magic loop or short 9 circulars **required skills** - long tail cast on - knitting in the round - cable knitting - kitchener stitch
